explanations.Large Language Model: The paper discusses generative AI, specifically mentioning ChatGPT, which is a type of large language model.
explanations.LLM: The paper focuses on generative AI like ChatGPT, which is a large language model (LLM).
explanations.ChatGPT: The paper explicitly mentions ChatGPT in the title and abstract as an example of generative AI that students analyze.
explanations.GPT-4: While not explicitly mentioned, GPT-4 is a successor to ChatGPT and falls under the same category of generative AI discussed in the paper.
